category.name: 4GD
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSECopyArrangementsDuringVICreation
preference.preference_description: Controls copy of Arrangements data from generic assembly to variant item on creation of a variant item. This preference is honored only if the preference PSECopyAbsOccDuringVICreation is set to true. Valid Values: * false: Arrangements data is not copied on variant item creation. * true: Arrangements data is copied on variant item creation.
